Prefix.value: THIS IS A PREFIX FOR THE VM NAME i.e. WVD  --  WARNING  --  DO NOT HAVE A TOTAL VM NAME LONGER THAN 15 CHARECTORS

Instance.value: <SELECT NUMBER OF VMs TO BUILD,  -- WARNING  -- INTIGERS ONLY i.e. 1 - 99>

ProfilePath.value: <ADD PATH TO CENTRAL STORAGE FOR WVD PROFILES i.e. \Contoso.com\CorpShare\WVDProfiles>

RegistrationToken.value: <GENERATE THIS TOKEN FROM THE WVD WEBUI or POWERSHELL AND INSERT HERE>

autoShutdownTime.value: <ENTER VM SHUTDOWN TIME in 24 HOUR i.e. 23:00>

autoShutdownTimeZone.value: <ENTER YOUR TIME ZONE NAME i.e. Eastern Standard Time>
